text:
Selkirk Transit is a public transit system based in Selkirk, Manitoba. The operators are Selkirk and District handi bus.
History.
In 2011, Selkirk Transit started with a cutaway bus.
In 2016, they have a big 30-foot bus.
In 2020 they will get an XE40 from New flyer as part of the Rapid transit commuter line owned by Winnipeg
